Class ClassRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room
      • ClassRoom

  • public class ClassRoom
extends Room
    This class simulates a room in the academic block

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean areLightsOn
      Represents the state of the lights.
      private boolean isAcOn
      Represents the state of the AC.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ClassRoom​(int length, int breadth, int height)
      Constructor for AcadBlockRoom By default, both the AC and Lights are off

      int calculateMaintenanceCost​()
      Calculates the maintenance cost of the acad block room according to the following conditions: The first part of the cost is the base cost of any room.
      void flipApplianceState​(java.lang.String appliance)
      Flips the current state of the appliance specified If the appliance is on, it turns it off and vice-versa

    • Field Detail

      • isAcOn

        private boolean isAcOn
        Represents the state of the AC. true if AC is on, else false

      • areLightsOn

        private boolean areLightsOn
        Represents the state of the lights. true is the lights are on, else false

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClassRoom

        public ClassRoom​(int length,
                 int breadth,
                 int height)
        Constructor for AcadBlockRoom By default, both the AC and Lights are off
        Parameters:
        length - An integer equal to the length of the room
        breadth - An integer equal to the breadth of the room
        height - An integer equal to the height of the room

    • Method Detail

      • flipApplianceState

        public void flipApplianceState​(java.lang.String appliance)
        Flips the current state of the appliance specified If the appliance is on, it turns it off and vice-versa
        Parameters:
        appliance - A string representing the appliance in question If appliance is "AC", that means the appliance in question is the AC If appliance is "Lights", that means the appliance in question are the lights

      • calculateMaintenanceCost

        public int calculateMaintenanceCost​()
        Calculates the maintenance cost of the acad block room according to the following conditions: The first part of the cost is the base cost of any room. Additionally: If the AC is on, cost increases by 10 units If the lights are on, cost increases by 5 units
        Overrides:
        calculateMaintenanceCost in class Room
        Returns:
        an integer equal to the maintenance cost of the acad block room
